entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 before morning. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or thunderstorms. High 25 except 13 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Showers or thunderstorms. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High 25 except 13 near Lake Erie. Humidex 30. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
